Press the "Show" button to see the translation of the current word. Press the "Next" button to see the next word. Press the up or down arrow button to switch between English to Indonesian mode and Indonesian to English mode. Press the lists button to choose another list, including the Favourites list. Press the favourites button to add words to the favourites list.
